database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS - Lomaiviticin A C D E - purified
entry.description: LCMS run of LC-purified lomaiviticins A, C, D & E - Reference: Kersten, R.D., Lane, A.L., Nett, M., Richter, T.K., Duggan, B.M., Dorrestein, P.C., Moore, B.S. Bioactivity-Guided Genome Mining Reveals the Lomaiviticin Biosynthetic Gene Cluster in Salinispora tropica. Chembiochem 14, 955-962 (2013).
